item.title: Cygames Issues Apology Following AI Studio Backlash
item.content:encoded:
Cygames has announced in a new statement that it will not implement GenAI in its products without prior notice and has apologised to the community.

For those unaware, Cygames announced that it will establish an AI studio, which is a subsidiary to develop and provide AI-based services and tools. The AI studio would participate in the research and development of its own models to offer services and tools for production sites. The studio has now backtracked on this, stating that GenAI will not be used to produce art for their products.

Cygames Releases New Statement on AI Studio

In a new statement on their official X account (formerly Twitter), Cygames has addressed the blowback they have received from the community since announcing their AI studio. The statement confirms that the ‚Äúart produced from generative AI isn‚Äôt used in their products and will not be implemented ‚Äúwithout prior notice.‚Äù The company added that it holds people who love games and the ‚Äúdignity, passion, and heart of creators and artists‚Äù in the highest regard.

The company also stated that the art for all the current Cyfames and other products has been created by the ‚Äútechnical know-how and manual work‚Äù of their staff members. Cygames has apologized for the grief and anxiety it caused to the community and has pledged to ‚Äúhonor creators, as well as champion the free expression of people.‚Äù

In other news, NVIDIA‚Äôs CEO has stated that the constant negativity surrounding the AI industry is ‚Äúextremely hurtful‚Äù. Additionally, Nintendo has denied claims that generative AI was used in promotional images for its new ‚ÄúMy Mario‚Äù toy line. What are your thoughts on Cygames issuing an apology for the concerns regarding their AI studio? Leave your thoughts down in the comments, and join the official Insider Gaming Discord server.

For more information from Insider Gaming, read about Animal Crossing: New Horizons Update 3.0 going live today. Don‚Äôt forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

item.title: ImperialHal Faces Controller Ban 12 Hours Before ALGS Championship
item.content:encoded:
The Apex Legends Global Series 2026 Championship is set to take place tomorrow in Sapporo, Japan. Today, one of the game‚Äôs most prolific pro players, ImperialHal, revealed that his first-choice controller was banned and won‚Äôt be usable in the event. For a pro player, that‚Äôs one of the most critical changes to make at the last minute.

ImperialHal, who flies the Team Falcons banner, posted on social media that it has ‚Äògot to be a joke, surely.‚Äô

ImperialHal‚Äôs ZD Ultimate Controller is Banned

The ALGS regulators have decided to ban ImperialHal‚Äôs chief controller, the ZD Ultimate, just one day before the ALGS Championship tournament takes place in Japan.

The ZD Ultimate is a lesser-known controller that boasts stacks of bonus features, including tri-connectivity, ultra-low latency, trigger switches, back paddles, extra buttons, and an RGB light strip. It currently costs $99.99 from the manufacturer.

In a post on social media, ImperialHal explained why it‚Äôs banned:

Because it has wireless capabilities that can be changed at any point via mobile and macro stuff that can‚Äôt be disabled.

He also pointed out that during the Esports World Cup, ‚Äòmultiple players‚Äô used controllers with similar functions, and they weren‚Äôt banned.

ImperialHal has been competing in the Apex Legends space since 2019, making a name for himself while flying the TSM flag, but in 2024, he picked up a spot on Team Falcons‚Äô developing roster. In 2023, he secured the top spot at the ALGS Championship, and a year later, hit a second-place finish at the Esports World Cup.

Last year produced a third-place finish at the ALGS Championship, so this is something of a redemption opportunity for the 26-year-old esports pro.

Do you think it‚Äôs right that the organizers banned ImperialHal‚Äôs controller so close to the start of the tournament? Let us know your thoughts on the Insider Gaming Discord server.

For more Insider Gaming esports, check out apEX‚Äôs declaration about the CS2 transfer market

item.title: Animal Crossing: New Horizons Update 3.0 Goes Live Today
item.content:encoded:
Animal Crossing: New Horizons update 3.0 is available now for some regions on the Nintendo Switch and Switch 2.

Nintendo is releasing the highly anticipated Animal Crossing Update 3.0 today across its platforms, adding tons of new free content to the game. Additionally, the update will provide an upgrade for the Switch 2 edition, including enhanced resolution, improved graphics, and more.

Animal Crossing: New Horizons Update 3.0 Switch 2 Edition Release Times

The free content update for the game is available now, it will take some time before the Switch 2 edition upgrade arrives. A new report by Eurogamer provides players with estimated release times for Animal Crossing: New Horizons Update 3.0 Switch 2 edition for various regions. Interested readers can check out the list below:

  • UK ‚Äì Thursday 15th January at 1 am (GMT)
  • Europe ‚Äì Thursday 15th January at 2 am (CET)
  • US West Coast ‚Äì Wednesday 14th January at 5 pm (PT)
  • US Central ‚Äì Wednesday 14th January at 7 pm (CT)
  • US East Coast ‚Äì Wednesday 14th January at 8 pm (ET)
  • Japan ‚Äì Thursday 15th January at 10 am (JST)
  • Australia ‚Äì Thursday 15th January at Noon (AEDT)

Animal Crossing: New Horizons Update 3.0 brings a variety of upgrades that are meant for Nintendo‚Äôs new console. Firstly, players will observe improved graphics and resolution for the game. The upgrade will also feature Joy-Con 2 mouse controls, which can be used to redecorate, create custom designs, and write messages on the bulletin board. A new item called Megaphone has been added, which incorporates the Switch 2‚Äôs Mic to call out Islanders with your voice. Lastly, online features have been expanded with the Switch 2 GameChat, which supports 12 players and lets players show their faces while playing.

Update 3.0 for Animal Crossing: New Horizons also brings tons of free content for Switch and Switch 2 players. Four additional villages have been introduced; however, you need to use an Amiibo to invite them. The biggest gameplay addition is the resort, which allows players to design rooms for guests. A Reset Service has been added to clear specific areas of the islands. Slumber Islands are available in a new dream world, and new collaborations will be introduced, too. You can learn all about the new update here.

What are your thoughts on Animal Crossing: New Horizons Update 3.0? Leave your thoughts down in the comments, and join the official Insider Gaming Discord server.

For more information from Insider Gaming, read about Riot Games congratulating Hytale six months after cancelling it. Don‚Äôt forget to sign up for our weekly newsletter.

item.title: All Hytale Creator Codes & How To Redeem
item.content:encoded:
The Creator Codes scheme is a way for communities to give back to their favorite streamers while simultaneously supporting a new release. Hytale also has a Creator Codes program, and this guide lists various creators and their codes.

Certain individuals are recognized as a creator for a game. This associates that personality with said title, and fans of the game and creator can support both. Hytale features the Creator Code, and you can scroll down for information on creators, codes, and how to redeem them.

Hytale Creator Codes, Listed

Here is a bunch of Creator Codes and the OG creators that Insider Gaming has been able to track down for Hytale. These are the codes you‚Äôll need to use when buying the game, and the list will be updated with more requests.

See if one of your favorite creators is on here, and make sure you note down the code correctly.

How To Redeem Hytale Creator Codes

You can only choose one Creator Code to use when buying your copy of Hytale, and this must be done during the checkout screen.

Here‚Äôs how you can do it and how the process works:

  1. Go to the Hytale Store.
  2. Choose which Hytale Edition you want to buy.
  3. Click Pre-Purchase underneath it.
  4. Go through the steps until you get to the checkout screen.
  5. Look down the left column until you see the Creator Code box.
  6. Enter your chosen Creator Code, then hit Confirm.
  7. If it‚Äôs worked, you will get confirmation.
  8. Complete your Hytale purchase to successfully aid the Creator Code scheme and secure your copy of Hytale!

Just to reiterate, if you have three Creator Codes, you can only choose one of them. Just hope that the others don‚Äôt find out!

If IG has missed out on any Creator Codes you‚Äôd like to see added, please go to the free-to-join Insider Gaming Discord Server and let the team know‚ÄîThe more the merrier.

Please check out the Hytale Early Access Roadmap, all Hytale Workbenches and how to make them, and how to play Hytale in 3rd-Person POV for more guides and content.

item.title: Riot Games Congratulates Hytale Launch Six Months After Canceling It
item.content:encoded:
In June 2025, Riot Games canceled Hytale and closed down Hypixel Studios, marking the end of the dreams of Minecraft fans worldwide. Hytale, the chief Hypixel project, had been in development for ten years, but it was cited as being ‚Äòoverly ambitious‚Äô and failed to hit quality expectations, and was wiped from the slate by Riot Games.

Four months later, in November, Simon Collins-Laflamme, the founder of Hypixel, acquired the Hytale IP from Riot Games and brought back to the grind to make the game a reality.

Hytale entered early access yesterday, and Riot Games was quick to praise the game‚Äôs launch in a move that some have dubbed ‚Äòironic at best.‚Äô

Hytale Skyrockets Despite Earlier Cancelation

Hytale was never supposed to see the light of day after it was canceled by Riot Games a little over six months ago. The game was deemed past the point of saving, and Riot shut the project down after suggesting it was unsustainable and too costly to push on with.

Yesterday, that all changed as Hytale hit the early access launch window many believed would never come.

Hytale skyrocketed up the charts, hitting a peak viewer count on Twitch of 440,000 users, numbers comparable to the launch of an AAA game. It‚Äôs not without its flaws, but it‚Äôs already being appreciated by those who spent years following the game‚Äôs development.

In a post on social media, Riot Games, which decimated Hytale mere months ago, congratulated the early access launch:

Congrats on early access üëä

In response, the Hytale team commented: ‚ÄòThank you for helping bring Hytale home.‚Äô

But fans were quick to criticize the situation:

  • ‚ÄòThis is like thanking your captor for beating you up.‚Äô
  • ‚ÄòHytale exists in spite of Riot, not because of them.‚Äô
  • ‚ÄòGenuinely, how did they help lmao‚Äô

Perhaps Riot Games is kicking itself for canceling what is now being regarded as one of the biggest indie releases of the last few years.

Let us know on the Insider Gaming Discord server if you‚Äôre playing (and enjoying) Hytale.

For more Insider Gaming coverage, check out the news that a new Tarkov update has changed the Zubr seats again

item.title: Shoot A Plane Codes (January 2026)
item.content:encoded:
Use these Roblox Shoot A Plane monthly redeem codes to get your hands on plenty of free rewards, including Cash and much more.

Shoot A Plane is a Roblox survival experience that assigns players to either hit flying targets or miss their chance at victory. The player must eliminate the planes to win, while the planes must escape your missile launcher to survive. The game also features multiple upgrades for your missile and launcher, however, to use them, you must purchase them with Cash.

The Roblox game is all about growing your missile to increase your Power, improving your targeting accuracy, getting Upgrades, and boosting your score. Generally, to become the best, you‚Äôll not only need the finest missile launcher but also a way to progress without spending hours. That‚Äôs when you should redeem the active Shoot A Plane codes, as they can be redeemed for Cash, which is essential for upgrading your equipment and taking down bigger planes.

Active Shoot A Plane Codes

  • WEARESORRY: 7k Cash
  • NEWYEAR: 7k Cash

Expired Shoot A Plane Codes

As of the writing of this article, there are no expired codes, so players can redeem the active codes safely.

How To Redeem Shoot A Plane Codes

Follow these steps to redeem all the active codes:

  1. Launch Shoot A Plane in Roblox
  2. Find the button labelled ‚ÄòCodes‚Äô on the far left side of the screen and click on it
  3. Type or paste an active code in the text-box
  4. Click on the button labelled ‚ÄòRedeem‚Äô to claim the freebie

Where To Get More Shoot A Plane Codes

Shoot A Plane codes are typically released through the game‚Äôs community and developer channels, but they don‚Äôt appear automatically in-game. The best places to catch them early are the official Shoot A Plane Discord server, which has a dedicated channel where new codes are posted first, and the Crazy Launchers Roblox Group where developers announce updates and milestones for this popular missile-launching game.

Codes often come out around game milestones but if you‚Äôre only checking sporadically, you‚Äôll very easily miss them because no alert system tells players when a code drops‚Äîor when it stops working. Because of this, the easiest strategy is to save this guide in your browser and check back instead of trying to monitor every source yourself.

This page is refreshed as soon as fresh codes go live, and any codes that have expired are taken out quickly so you always see only the ones that still work.

Having fun using codes in Roblox games? Then check out the latest codes for 99 Nights in the Forest, Type Soul, and Azure Latch. Also, check out the Insider Gaming Discord server.
